pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualizing Panel Data with Dichotomous Treatments // Visualizes panel data with dichotomous treatments. 'panelView' has two main functionalities: (1) it visualizes the treatment and missing-value statuses of each observation in a panel/time- series-cross-sectional (TSCS) dataset; and (2) it plots the outcome variable (either continuous or discrete) in a time- series fashion.
